answers.driverLanguage: Yes, our drivers are Brazilian or fluent in Portuguese to ensure the best communication and comfort during your trip.
answers.airportMeeting: The driver will be waiting in the arrivals area with a sign containing your name, making it easy to meet immediately after your arrival.
answers.nameSign: Yes, the driver will have a sign with your name so you can easily identify them at the airport.
answers.flightInfo: This information is necessary for us to plan your airport reception and ensure that the appropriate vehicle is available, considering possible delays or early arrivals.
answers.howItWorks: We offer private transfer service from the airport to your destination in New York, with comfort and safety. You book with us in advance, and a driver will be waiting for you upon arrival.
answers.tourOptions: We work with a variety of tours, including City Tours of New York, visits to iconic tourist spots, shopping tours, among others, all with Portuguese-speaking guides.
answers.bestOutlet: The choice of outlet depends on your personal preferences, but we are prepared to take you to the most popular ones, such as Woodbury Common Premium Outlets and Jersey Gardens, offering great shopping options.
answers.cityTourRoute: Our City Tour covers the main tourist attractions of New York, including Times Square, Statue of Liberty, Central Park, among others, with flexibility to customize according to your interest.
answers.carCityTour: The car City Tour is a private and comfortable experience, allowing you to see the main tourist attractions of the city with the convenience of not having to walk or depend on public transportation.
answers.flightDelay: We monitor flights and adjust scheduling according to any delays, ensuring the driver will be there when you arrive.
answers.flightCancellation: In case of flight cancellation, we ask that you contact us as soon as possible to reschedule the service at no additional cost.
answers.tripCancellation: For trip cancellations, we offer full or partial refund, depending on the advance notice of cancellation.
answers.bestCarType: We offer spacious and comfortable vehicles, with child seat options and adequate space to accommodate elderly people, ensuring safety and comfort during transport.
answers.pricingMeaning: It means that the quoted value covers the entire transportation service from one point to another, without additional costs based on time or distance.
answers.bestTimeToVisit: New York is charming all year round, but many prefer to visit in spring (April to June) or fall (September to November), when the weather is milder.
answers.bookWithoutHotel: Yes, you can book the transfer service with us, but it is important to inform the final address as soon as possible to ensure adequate transportation.
answers.hotelRecommendations: Yes, we can offer hotel recommendations based on our experiences and customer feedback, considering your location and budget preferences.
